Experience

Web Developer

2nd year project - Caraga State University

During my 2nd year, I teamed up with two other developers to create a website that streamlined the process for local businesses to showcase their products and services. Our project aimed to address the need for a user-friendly online presence for small businesses that lacked the resources to build their own websites.

November 2023

Database Programmer

2nd year project - Caraga State University

During my 2nd year, I collaborated with a team of developers on a project to create a website designed to help local non-profits manage their donor information and fundraising events more efficiently. As the database programmer for the project, my primary role was to design and implement the database system that would support the site's functionality.

November 2023

Interests

Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy most of my time being a student performer in Caraga State University, as I am a member of the esteemed university chorale Budjong Chorale Ensemble. In summer, I love to spend my time playing volleyball, I also enjoy going to beach and watch the sun set.

When forced indoors, I follow a number of sci-fi and fantasy genre movies and television shows, I am an aspiring chef, and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the front-end web development world.
